news_header: UPM's pulp mill in Uruguay significantly impacted its operating profit.
news_text: In July-September, UPM reported a 33% increase in comparable operating profit to EUR 291 million, although net sales fell by 2% to EUR 2.5 billion. CEO Massimo Reynaudo attributed much of the profit improvement to the UPM Paso de los Toros pulp mill in Uruguay, but noted that the results were below expectations despite a positive market outlook.
